tool_description: Generates SEPA XML files for credit transfer (SCT) or direct debits (SDD). You can also validate IBANs and generate mandates in PDF format.
name: SEPA XML Generator
title: SEPA XML Generator

api_list.name: retrieve-mandate

required_parameters.name: reference
required_parameters.description: Retrieve mandate with the given reference.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sepa-xml-generator1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/mandates/abc12345"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sepa-xml-generator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sepa-xml-generator1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/mandates/{reference}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sepa-xml-generator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
